S04bsu010_u:3: ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma kalantakanivāse veṇuvane mahatā bhikṣusaṅaghena sārdhaṃ dviśatapacāśadbhiḥ bhikṣubhiḥ saṃbahulaiśca bodhisattvamahāsattvaiḥ /
S04bsu010_u:4: atha bhagavānanekaśatasahasraparivāraparivṛtaḥ purato 'valokya dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
S04bsu010_u:5: ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇamavasāne kalyāṇaṃ svarthaṃ suvyajanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ prakāśayati sma //
S04bsu010_u:6: 2. tadā magadharājaḥ śreṇyo vimvisāraḥ mahātā rājavibhavena mahatā ca rājabalena rājagṛhānmahānagarānniṣkramya yena veṇuvanaṃ yena ca bhagavān tenopasaṅakramīt /
S04bsu010_u:7: upasaṅakramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā abhivandya triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte atiṣṭhat /
S04bsu010_u:8: ekānte sthitvā magadharājaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāraḥ bhagavantametadavocat /
S04bsu010_u:9: kathaṃ bhagavan kṛtaṃ karma saṃcayaṃ pratirudhya ciraniruddhaṃ maraṇakāla upasthitaṃ manaso 'bhimukhībhavati /
S04bsu010_u:12: tadyathā mahārāja puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapne janapadakalyāṇyā striyā sārdhaṃ paricaret /
S04bsu010_u:14: tatkiṃ manyase mahārāja svapne sā janapadakalyāṇī strī //
S04bsu010_u:17: tat kiṃ manyase mahārāja api nu sa puruṣaḥ kiṃ paṇḍitajātīyo bhavet /
S04bsu010_u:21: atyantatayā tu bhagavan svapne janapadakalyāṇī strī na saṃvidyate /
S04bsu010_u:26: evameva mahārāja balo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaścakṣuṣā rūpāṇi ddaṣṭvā saumanasyasthānīyāni rūpāṇyabhiniviśet /
S04bsu010_u:29: saṃrakto rāgajaṃ dveṣajaṃ mohajaṃ karma kāyavāṅmanobhirabhisaṃskaroti /
S04bsu010_u:31: niruddhaṃ na pūrvāṃ diśaṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati /
S04bsu010_u:38: tat karma kadācinmaraṇa kālasamaya upasthite tatsabhāgasya karmaṇaḥ kṣayāt caramavijñāne niruddhe manaso 'bhimukhībhavati /
S04bsu010_u:48: tasya ca mahārāja prathamavijñānasya samanantaraniraddhasya tatsabhāgā cittasaṃtatiḥ pravartate /
S04bsu010_u:50: tatra mahārāja na kaściddharmaḥ asmāt lokātparalokaṃ saṅkrāmati /
S04bsu010_u:66: prathamavijñānasya mahārāja aupapattyaṃśikasya samanantaraniruddhasya nirantarā cittasantatiḥ pravartate /
S04bsu010_u:72: 9. yena yena hi nāmnā vai yo yo dharmo 'bhilapyate /
S04bsu010_u:73: nāsau saṃvidyate tatra dharmāṇāṃ sā hi dharmatā //
S04bsu010_u:74: 10. nāmnā hi nāmatā śūnyā nāmnā nāma na vidyate /
S04bsu010_u:77: sāpyatra kalpanā śūnyā yayā śūnyā vikalpitāḥ //
S04bsu010_u:82: 14. na cakṣūḥ prekṣate rūpaṃ mano dharmānna vetti ca /
S04bsu010_u:83: etattu paramaṃ satyaṃ yatra loko na gāhate //
S04bsu010_u:85: magadhadeśarājaḥ śreṇyaḥ bimbisāraḥ te bodhisattvāste ca bhikṣavaḥ sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko muditvā bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandan //
